body_content.explanation: the quality of being without light, or a situation in which there is little or no light:
examples: The city centre was plunged into darkness by the power cut.
They made their way up the beach in darkness.
I could hardly see anything in the darkness.

body_content.explanation: the quality of being nearer to black than white in colour:
examples: Cook a little longer to increase the darkness of the sauce.

body_content.explanation: the quality of being sad and without hope:
examples: I noticed the darkness of his mood.

body_content.explanation: the quality of being evil or threatening:
examples: We are all fascinated by human darkness, by evil.
